recommend.title: Tuol Sleng Genocide Museum
recommend.infor: Feel the solemnity of Cambodia's past at the Tuol Sleng Genocide Museum

recommend.title: Banon
recommend.infor: The most beautiful place in Battambang city

recommend.title: Wat Phnom
recommend.infor: Wat Phnom is a historic Buddhist temple located in Phnom Penh, Cambodia, serving as a symbol of the city's founding and spirituality

recommend.title: Royal Palace
recommend.infor: The Royal Palace in Phnom Penh, Cambodia, is a symbol of the monarchy and the official residence of the King. Known for its stunning Khmer architecture and the iconic Silver Pagoda

recommend.title: Mekong rivers
recommend.infor: Enjoy a selection of beverages, witness the spectacular skyline, and see this city from a totally unique vantage point

recommend.title: Tonle Sap
recommend.infor: Experience the beauty of Cambodia with this sunset cruise

recommend.title: Factory Phnom Penh
recommend.infor: A fantastic place the old Levi factory converted into an art space

recommend.title: Win Win Memorial
recommend.infor: The Win-Win Memorial is a monument that marks the end of civil wars in Cambodia and through then Prime Minister Hun Sen's Win-Win policy

recommend.title: Wat Langka
recommend.infor: Nice wat close to the Independance Monument but by now you have probably seen enough wats to take a photo and go elsewhere

recommend.title: Oudong Temples
recommend.infor: Oudong Temples are ancient Buddhist temples in Cambodia, offering a spiritual and historically rich experience.

recommend.title: Angkor Wat
recommend.infor: Angkor Wat stands as a breathtaking testament to human ingenuity, with its awe-inspiring architecture, intricate carvings, and majestic scale that continue to mesmerize visitors from around the world

recommend.title: Angkor Thom
recommend.infor: Angkor Thom astonishes with its monumental stone gates, the iconic faces of Bayon temple, and a vast complex that showcases the grandeur of the Khmer Empire

recommend.title: Taprohm
recommend.infor: Ta Prohm amazes with its mystical allure, as ancient stone structures intertwine with towering trees, creating a mesmerizing and otherworldly atmosphere.

recommend.title: Phnom Tamoa Zoological park
recommend.infor: Phnom Tamao Wildlife Sanctuary amazes with its stunning natural beauty and diverse wildlife, providing a remarkable experience for nature lovers

recommend.title: Kirirom National Park
recommend.infor: Kirirom National Park amazes with its stunning landscapes, lush forests, and serene lakes, creating a captivating haven of natural beauty

recommend.title: Phnom Chisor
recommend.infor: Phnom Chisor astonishes with its ancient hilltop temple, offering breathtaking views and a captivating sense of spirituality

recommend.title: Prasith and Reap Temples
recommend.infor: Prasith and Reap Temples amaze with intricate architecture, sacred ambiance, and profound historical significance, enchanting visitors with a captivating journey

recommend.title: Killing Fields
recommend.infor: The Killing Fields in Phnom Penh: a haunting memorial to the victims of the Khmer Rouge, a stark reminder of a tragic past

recommend.title: Dinart
recommend.infor: DinArt Gallery features the work of contemporary Khmer artist. His signature Apsara images are widely known within Cambodia and in Europe

recommend.title: Otres Beach
recommend.infor: Otres Beach amazes with its pristine sands, turquoise waters, and tranquil ambiance, offering a blissful seaside retreat

recommend.title: Kbal Chhay Waterfalls
recommend.infor: Kbal Chay is a tiered waterfall with a 14-metre drop that's actually one of the major sources of freshwater for the city of Sihanoukville

recommend.title: Tuk Tuk Bambootrain
recommend.infor: Ride a tuk tuk as you explore the city, experience traveling on a bamboo train

recommend.title: Killing&BatCaves
recommend.infor: The most beautiful place in Battambang city

recommend.title: National Museum of Cambodia
recommend.infor: The most beautiful Museum in the city

recommend.title: Wat Ek Phnom
recommend.infor: Wat Ek Phnom in Battambang, Cambodia, is a magnificent ancient temple that showcases the rich history and architectural brilliance of the Khmer civilization

recommend.title: Battambang Crocodile Farm
recommend.infor: This farm is built along the river and is a breeding ground made to breed baby animals

recommend.title: Damrey Sor Pagoda
recommend.infor: Damrey Sor Pagoda is made right in the heart of the city, which makes it easy for the travelers to visit this place

recommend.title: Phnom Sampeau
recommend.infor: Phnom Sampeau is an archaeological site located in Sampeau Commune and it is home to the infamous Killing Caves and a Bat Cave

recommend.title: Romcheik5 Artspace
recommend.infor: Romcheik5 Artspace is a contemporary art museum located in the provincial town of Battambang in Cambodia

recommend.title: Kep
recommend.infor: Kep is the smallest province (khaet) of Cambodia covering 336 km2 (130 sq mi), with a population of 41,798.

recommend.title: Banteay Srei
recommend.infor: Banteay Srei Temple is built largely of red sandstone, a medium that lends itself to the elaborate decorative wall carvings which are still observable today

recommend.title: Bayon Temple
recommend.infor: Bayon temple is famous for its architecture. it is one of the most beautiful temples in Cambodia. it’s a must visit if you wish to immerse yourself in history

recommend.title: Preah Khan Temple
recommend.infor: Sacred Sword Temple is adjacent to the northeast of Tongwang City. It was built in the 12th century

recommend.title: Phare Ponleu Selpak
recommend.infor: Phare Ponleu Selpak is a multi-arts, non-profit association for Cambodian children, famous for its circus performance

recommend.title: Phimeanakas
recommend.infor: A pyramid-shaped temple in the jungle behind the Terrace of the Elephants in Angkor Thom

recommend.title: Ta Som
recommend.infor: Tasun Temple is a small temple located on the east side of Longpan Shui Pond, surrounded by Kapok trees (that is, snake trees)

recommend.title: Prasat Suor Prat
recommend.infor: The Zodiac Pagoda, also called the Twelve Pagoda Temple, is located in Tongwang City, with a total of twelve small pagodas

recommend.title: Baphuon Temple
recommend.infor: This building is very majestic and existed before the construction of Tongwang City

recommend.title: Terrace of the Elephants
recommend.infor: The War Elephant Step, also known as the Dou Elephant Terrace, is located in the city of Tongwang

recommend.title: Pre Rup temple
recommend.infor: The building of Biliu Temple is very high. When you climb up, you can see the forest in the distance

recommend.title: Ta Keo
recommend.infor: The whole temple is composed of solid long strips of bluestone neatly stacked on three layers of platforms, and five lotus-shaped towers stand at the top, similar to Angkor Wat

recommend.title: Roluos Temples
recommend.infor: The Rorosh complex is the masterpiece of Indravarman I. It is one of the large temples built by the Khmers and marked the beginning of the era of Khmer classical art

recommend.title: Banteay Kdei
recommend.infor: Bandikati was built at the end of the 12th century by Jayapatma VII. It is a Buddhist monastery, the central tower and the promenade have collapsed, and it is difficult to feel the previous layout

recommend.title: Banteay Samre
recommend.infor: It is speculated that it was built in the same period as Angkor Wat, but its architectural structure is significantly different from many Angkor temples

recommend.title: Neak Poan
recommend.infor: Nirvana Palace is also called Longpan Pool, which means the entwined snake

recommend.title: Pub Street
recommend.infor: Some may find it over-powering, but if you're looking for where everybody is, then Pub Street it is

recommend.title: Prasat Beng Mealea
recommend.infor: The temple used to be utterly consumed by jungle, but some of the dense foliage has been cut back and cleaned up in recent years

recommend.title: Bou Sraa Waterfall
recommend.infor: Phare Ponleu Selpak is a multi-arts, non-profit association for Cambodian children, famous for its circus performance

recommend.title: Phnom DoKramom
recommend.infor: Phnom Dokramom is an absolutely breathtaking mountain peak nestled in the heart of Cambodia. This natural wonder is a true marvel, captivating all who have the privilege of laying eyes upon it.

recommend.title: Lolei
recommend.infor: Built on an island in an artificial pool in Khmer history. It was a major temple before Jayavarman II, the founder of the Angkor Dynasty, moved his capital to Angkor. The temple is dedicated to Shiva Linga

recommend.title: Koh Ker Temple
recommend.infor: the most mysterious and shocking building is hidden deep in the jungle and rarely disturbed by the outside world

recommend.title: Battambang Provincial Museum
recommend.infor: Battambang Provincial Museum is a museum located in Kamkor village in the provincial town of Battambang in western Cambodia
